mainBoard.name: Prized Unicorn
mainBoard.originalText: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.

rulings.text: If a creature the defending player controls can’t block Prized Unicorn for any reason (such as being tapped), then it doesn’t block Prized Unicorn. If there’s a cost associated with having a creature block Prized Unicorn, the defending player isn’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to block.
If more than one Prized Unicorn is attacking, creatures that could block must block one Prized Unicorn, but they don’t all have to block the same Prized Unicorn.

mainBoard.text: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.

mainBoard.flavorText: "I sing to the branches, and they reach to the sky. I sing to the leaves, and they open to the sun. I sing to the roots, and they dig their fingers deep. I sing the song that creation sung."

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich singe für die Zweige, und sie wachsen in den Himmel. Ich singe für die Blätter, und sie öffnen sich der Sonne. Ich singe für die Wurzeln, und sie strecken sich weit. Ich singe das Lied der Schöpfung."
foreignData.name: Waldland-Mystikerin
foreignData.text: {T}: Erzeuge {G}.

foreignData.flavorText: "Canto a las ramas que se elevan hacia el cielo. Canto a las hojas que se abren para recibir el sol. Canto a las raíces que se hunden en lo profundo de la tierra. Canto la melodía de la creación".
foreignData.name: Mística de los bosques
foreignData.text: {T}: Agrega {G}.

foreignData.flavorText: « Je chante aux branches, et elles atteignent les cieux. Je chante aux feuilles, et elles s'ouvrent au soleil. Je chante aux racines, et elles plongent dans le sol. Je chante le chant de la création. »
foreignData.name: Mystique des sylves
foreignData.text: {T} : Ajoutez {G}.

foreignData.flavorText: "Canto ai rami, che s'innalzano al cielo. Canto alle foglie, che s'aprono al sole. Canto alle radici, che afferrano la terra. Canto la melodia della creazione."
foreignData.name: Mistica delle Selve
foreignData.text: {T}: Aggiungi {G}.

foreignData.flavorText: 「枝に歌えば空まで届く。樹葉に歌えば陽を受ける。樹根に歌えばその指伸びる。私の歌は創造の歌。」

foreignData.text: {T}：{G}を加える。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・ドルイド

foreignData.flavorText: "나는 나뭇가지들에게 노래해 주고, 그것들은 하늘로 뻗어올라간다. 나는 잎사귀들에게 노래해 주고, 그것들은 태양을 향해 펼쳐진다. 나는 뿌리들에게 노래해 주고, 그것들은 더 깊숙히 손가락을 박아넣는다. 나는 창조의 노래를 부른다."

foreignData.text: {T}: {G}를 추가한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Eu canto para os galhos e eles se elevam rumo aos céus. Eu canto para as folhas e elas se abrem para o sol. Eu canto para as raízes e elas fincam profundamente seus dedos. Eu canto a canção que a criação cantou."
foreignData.name: Mística da Mata
foreignData.text: {T}: Adicione {G}.

foreignData.flavorText: «Я пою ветвям, и они тянутся в небеса. Я пою листьям, и они раскрываются лучам солнца. Я пою корням, и они уходят глубоко в землю. Я пою песню, которую пело само творение».

foreignData.text: {T}: добавьте {G}.

foreignData.flavorText: 「枝桠闻我歌声，迎空扬碧伸扬。树叶闻我歌声，沐日茂密绽放。根茎闻我歌声，破土繁茂生长。问我旋律为何，这是造物之歌。」
